description:
Claire Holt said she left The Originals last year to focus on spending more time with her loved ones, and it looks like that was a good decision - she's now got a wedding in the works!Claire Holt说她离开《初代吸血鬼》后把更多的时间放在了和自己爱的人相处上，现在看起来这是个正确的决定——她要结婚了！

Holt, 27, is engaged to her longtime boyfriend Matt Kaplan, she announced Monday via social media. The Vampire Diaries alum posted a picture of herself and Kaplan on Instagram and Twitter, captioning the photo "Yes!" along with a ring emoji.27岁的Holt周一再社交媒体上宣布，她和已经恋爱多年的男友Matt Kaplan订婚。这位《吸血鬼日记》女性在Instagram和Twitter上发布了一张和Kaplan的合照，并写了一句“我愿意！”旁边还有一个emoji表情。

Holt is currently starring alongside David Duchovny on the NBC drama Aquarius, which was recently renewed for a second season.目前Holt正在和David Duchovny一起出演NBC美剧《Aquarius》，这部剧日前已经被续订第二季。

title: 《初代吸血鬼》Claire Holt订婚！
